title: Bactopia pipeline parameters
description: A flexible pipeline for complete analysis of bacterial genomes

input_parameters.title: Required Parameters
input_parameters.description: The following parameters are how you will provide either local or remote samples to be processed by Bactopia.

samples.description: A FOFN (via bactopia prepare) with sample names and paths to FASTQ/FASTAs to process
samples.help: Created using `bactopia prepare`. Cannot be used with `--r1 & --r2`, `--se`, or `--ont`

r1.description: First set of compressed (gzip) Illumina paired-end FASTQ reads (requires --r2 and --sample)
r1.help: Requires `--r2` and `--sample`. Cannot be used with `--samples` or `--se`.

r2.description: Second set of compressed (gzip) Illumina paired-end FASTQ reads (requires --r1 and --sample)
r2.help: Requires `--r2` and `--sample`. Cannot be used with `--samples` or `--se`.

se.help: Requires `--sample`. Cannot be used with `--samples` or `--r1 & --r2`

hybrid.description: Create hybrid assembly using Unicycler.  (requires --r1, --r2, --ont and --sample)

short_polish.description: Create hybrid assembly from long-read assembly and short read polishing.  (requires --r1, --r2, --ont and --sample)

sample.description: Sample name to use for the input sequences

accessions.description: A file containing ENA/SRA Experiment accessions or NCBI Assembly accessions to processed
accessions.header:
### For Downloading from SRA/ENA or NCBI Assembly
  **Note: Downloaded assemblies will have error free Illumina reads simulated for processing.**

accession.description: Sample name to use for the input sequences

assembly.description: A assembled genome in compressed FASTA format. (requires --sample)
assembly.help: Error-free Illumina reads will be simulated for down stream processing
assembly.header:
### For Processing an Assembly
  **Note: Assemblies will have error free Illumina reads simulated for processing.**

check_samples.description: Validate the input FOFN provided by --samples

dataset_parameters.title: Dataset Parameters
dataset_parameters.description: Define where the pipeline should find input data and save output data.

species.description: Name of species for species-specific dataset to use
species.help: These datasets include MLST schemas, reference genomes, protein sets, etc...

ask_merlin.description: Ask Merlin to execute species specific Bactopia tools based on Mash distances

coverage.description: Reduce samples to a given coverage, requires a genome size

genome_size.description: Expected genome size (bp) for all samples, required for read error correction and read subsampling
genome_size.help: If `--species` is used, `min`, `median`, `mean`, or `max` can be used for `--genome_size`

use_bakta.description: Use Bakta for annotation, instead of Prokka
